articles.summary: Elon Musk is setting his sights on another business, telecommunications. Elon Musk became the world’s richest person this month by upending the global auto industry and disrupting aerospace heavyweights with reusable rockets. Now he’s setting his sights on another business dominated by entrenched incumbents: telecommunications. Musk’s Space Exploration Technologies Corp. has launched more than 1,000 […] The post Elon Musk Is Now Setting His Eyes On This Business appeared first on NDNewsExpress.
articles.author: ndnews
articles.title: Elon Musk Is Now Setting His Eyes On This Business

articles.summary: Volkswagen CEO Herbert Deiss opened his Twitter account in December 2020. But after being inactive for a month, he made his Twitter debut on Wednesday with a friendly jibe at his professional rival, Tesla CEO, Elon Musk.Debuting with a Bang –In his very first tweet, the German CEO warned his Tesla Counterpart that they were coming after Tesla's market share. Mr. Diess also reminded the world's newly-crowned richest person that Volkswagen was already influencing the European market for electric vehicles.
articles.author: Amandeep Suter
articles.title: Volkswagen CEO Herbert Deiss Makes Twitter Debut With A Jibe At Elon Musk

articles.summary: After several days of delays, SpaceX is finally hoping to launch 133 satellites into orbit. Up to 10 Starlink satellites will be onboard the mission, dubbed Transporter-1, as Elon Musk looks to increase the company's broadband providing capabilities. However, also on board is a mixture of commercial and government satellites which will be released into orbit. SpaceX has a 40 minute launch window from the Cape Canaveral Space Force Station, Florida, which begins at 2:20pm GMT (9:20am local time). SpaceX said the weather conditions are "60 percent favourable" so there is a 40 percent chance the launch could be delayed yet again.
articles.author: Sean Martin
articles.title: SpaceX launch live stream: Elon Musk's company to launch 133 satellites on Falcon 9

articles.summary: Having gained the top spot in the list of richest people in the world, Elon Musk is having a gala time with his business ventures. The technology mogul managed to top two industries - automobile and space, with two of his firms. He now eyes a third - telecom.Now it might sound like a completely unrelated venture for Musk to pursue but that is not the case in reality. Musk's endeavour towards a telecom firm is being spun from his private space firm SpaceX, as part of a project named Starlink. Elon Musk (Image: Reuters)For those unaware, Starlink is a low-Earth satellite constellation that aims to provide broadband internet to the remotest of places in the world.
articles.author: Sarthak Dogra
articles.title: After Auto And Space, Elon Musk Aims To Disrupt Telecom Sector With Starlink Satellite Internet
articles.rights: Copyright: © 2021 Times Internet Limited. Powered by Indiatimes Lifestyle Network. All rights reserved, https://www.indiatimes.com/privacypolicy

articles.summary: What happened last week? Broadcasting legend Larry King died on Saturday in Los Angeles, following a 60-year career, and about 40,000 on-camera interviews. He reportedly had been battling the coronavirus . Over the years, he'd talked with many of the world's most important business leaders. Here are three other business stories that you might have missed last week.  Elon Musk offered a $100 million prize Elon Musk. Maja Hitij/Getty Images SpaceX and Tesla CEO Elon Musk on Thursday announced a $100 million prize for whoever creates the "best" carbon capture technology.
articles.author: Kevin Shalvey
articles.title: What happened last week? Elon Musk announced a $100 million prize, Shepard Smith unloaded on Fox News, and PayPal reportedly removed a legal defense fundraiser

articles.summary: Dropbox CEO Drew Houston, left, and Mark Zuckerberg. Getty Images Bill Gates and Warren Buffett. Elon Musk and Larry Ellison. Jeff Bezos and Barry Diller.  What do all these high-profile pairings have in common? They're all close friendships within the world of tech.  Silicon Valley may be known for its competitive spirit, but it's also fostered several years-long friendships among some of its most famous executives. Microsoft cofounder Bill Gates and investor Warren Buffett, for example, have been buddies for nearly 30 years .
articles.author: Avery Hartmans
articles.title: Billionaire tech mogul Larry Ellison says he and Elon Musk are 'close friends.' Here are 8 other tech exec friendships that have thrived in the competitive world of Silicon Valley.

articles.summary: The Boring Company's first iconic project that had its name resonate across the country, the Vegas Loop, has now finished its construction and would soon be opening and launching with CEO Elon Musk. The CEO said that the opening would be a theme party, featuring the iconic design of the game called "Fallout" which has a post-apocalyptic setting in a dystopian world. (Photo : The Boring Company) Elon Musk's Boring Company Tunnel: Las Vegas Loop The company Elon Musk started and has developed a tunneling program with, The Boring Company, has finished its construction of the famed "Vegas Loop" which is the country and the world's first EV-powered underground tunnel.
articles.title: Elon Musk to Host a 'Fallout-themed' Party for Vegas Loop's Opening with The Boring Company!

articles.summary: Elon Musk has just unveiled the new Tesla Model S, and the vehicle's built-in gaming system is apparently capable of running Cyberpunk 2077. Elon Musk, the CEO of Tesla and founder and CEO of SpaceX, boasts that the upcoming Tesla Model S can actually run Cyberpunk 2077 on the car's interior screen. The recently unveiled new Tesla Model S, the first remodel of the vehicle since it launched in 2012, includes a number of fancy features such as a redesigned interior and an impressive powertrain. Elon Musk is viewed as an eccentric figure, and he is known for keeping his finger on the pulse of popular culture.
articles.author: Thomas McNulty
articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Playable In Tesla Model S, Boasts Elon Musk

articles.summary: GameStop is rejoicing for an impressive increase in its stocks after a massive jump to $10 billion and is expected to continue its growth to a whopping $15 billion thanks to Tesla CEO, Elon Musk, and his tweet about this. With a simple one-word tweet and a link which the CEO shared on social media, the surge of growth for GameStop is not coming to a stop. (Photo : Photo by Spencer Platt/Getty Images)People pass a GameStop store in lower Manhattan on September 16, 2019 in New York City. GameStop has announced that they will be closing between 180 and 200 stores before the end of the fiscal year due to a drop in sales.
articles.title: GameStop Stock Projected to Hit $15B Soon All Thanks to Elon Musk's 'Gamestonk' Tweet!

He showed his brilliance many times before, even at a very young age. (Photo : Photo by Bryan Bedder/Getty Images for IMG)NEW YORK, NEW YORK - FEBRUARY 10: Maye Musk signs her book at NYFW The Talks, Silver is the New Blonde during NYFW: The Shows at Spring Studios on February 10, 2020 in New York City. However, her mother, a 72-year-old model, said that she thought her son would end up in a basement.

articles.summary: Elon Musk tweeting from below Las Vegas. He posted this photo of him in the Boring company tunnel. Posted at 8:17 AM, Jan 25, 2021 LAS VEGAS (KTNV) — Elon Musk was tweeting from below Las Vegas.He posted a photo of him in the Boring Company tunnel on Sunday. Under Vegas in @boringcompany tunnel yesterday with my boys pic.twitter.com/tLfOuiEdFm— Elon Musk (@elonmusk) January 24, 2021 The Boring Company, owned by Musk, is digging tunnels that will house a high-speed rail service around the Las Vegas Convention Center and beyond.

articles.summary: Shares of Etsy were popping with a single tweet by the Tesla CEO Elon Musk. Etsy's stock rose nine per cent in premarket trading following Musk's tweet that said 'I kinda love Etsy.' Reuters The e-commerce company wasn't moving at all in the premarket prior to Musk's early morning call out. It's now set to be the biggest gainer in the S&P 500 when markets open.I kinda love Etsy— Elon Musk (@elonmusk) January 26, 2021    Musk explained that he had bought a hand-knit wool Marvin the Martian helm (sic) for his dog.
articles.author: KC Archana
articles.title: A Single Tweet By Elon Musk About One Company Made Its Stocks Skyrocket!

articles.summary: The Boring Company's Vegas Loop doesn't have an opening date. But when it does, CEO Elon Musk has a Fallout-themed opening party planned for the event, launching a new era of tourist transportation in Las Vegas.Musk tweeted a photograph of him and his three children on Sunday afternoon from the Vegas Loop's loading dock that lies underneath the Sin City. Musk, along with his three children and three Tesla Model 3 vehicles, stood in a modern platform that will eventually be the waiting area for Vegas residents and tourists who are attempting to move to another part of the city in record time.
articles.author: Joey Klender
articles.title: Boring Company eyes Vegas tunnel grand opening with video game themed party

articles.summary: It's rather unusual for a company to hire workers specifically for a purpose like this, but then again, Tesla is an unusual company with an eccentric CEO. Perhaps that sort of environment demands a different approach to customer service (though Tesla does, of course, still have its own full support department). This news comes courtesy of a job listing published on Tesla's official website. The position is remote but full-time, and those approved for it will be formally known as "Energy Customer Support Specialists.
articles.author: Polycount
articles.title: Tesla is hiring dedicated support workers to handle angry tweets directed at Elon Musk

articles.summary: With just one tweet, Elon Musk brought GameStop stock prices to unprecedented heights. THE TWEET THAT BROUGHT GAMESTOP STOCK PRICES TO THE SKY Elon Musk’s tweet earlier today led to one of the biggest spikes in GameStop’s stock prices ever. Elon’s tweet follows a concerted effort by Redditors at r/wallstreetbets. With an assumption that hedge […] The post Elon Musk tweets about GameStop, GameStop stocks rise to new records appeared first on ClutchPoints.
articles.author: Franz Christian Irorita
articles.title: Elon Musk tweets about GameStop, GameStop stocks rise to new records

articles.summary: Elon Musk has released a series of tweets that are about Robinhood's updated stock trading policies that have prohibited retail investors from joining the parade and trend of the growing GameStop and AMC investments. The popular app is now involved in a controversy after being famous for its massive trading opportunities. The world-renowned Tesla and SpaceX CEO, entrepreneur, and tech mogul, Elon Musk, has called out Robinhood for its alleged "unfair" policies in trading saying that it is "BS" and has been observing a "shorting scam.
articles.author: Isaiah Alonzo
articles.title: Elon Musk Calls Out Robinhood for 'BS' Shorting Scam on Stock Trading—Only Allows Small-Time Investors!

articles.summary: Elon Musk and musician Claire Boucher, aka Grimes, have been dating since 2018, and the eccentric couple has made plenty of headlines for their unusual partnership and child's name. While some doubted Grimes and Musk's potential to have a loving relationship, they're seemingly still together in 2021. But they seem to have quite an age gap between them. Here's how much older Musk is. Elon Musk and Grimes have been together since 2018 Elon Musk and Grimes attend the Metropolitan Museum of Arts gala | Theo Wargo/Getty Images for Huffington Post RELATED: Elon Musk and Grimes Have Reportedly Been On and Off Their Whole Relationship Musk has had plenty of high-profile relationships, and few ever imagined he'd be dating the tech-pop musician Grimes.
articles.author: Lauren Weiler
articles.title: What Is Elon Musk's Age, and How Much Older Is He Than Grimes?

articles.summary: SpaceX   CEO  Elon Musk has repeatedly made plain his plan to make space accessible enough to allow mankind to evolve into an 'interplanetary species.' A key component of this concept is the SpaceX Starship and Super-Heavy launch system. Such cutting-edge reusable SpaceX technology will hopefully allow for both lunar and manned Mars bases and the eventual exploration of deep space. SpaceX is building floating, superheavy-class spaceports for Mars, Moon & hypersonic travel around Earth Elon Musk But in order to get Elon Musk's plan off the ground, SpaceX needs to first construct spaceports at sea.
articles.title: SpaceX Starship: Elon Musk reveals render of ‘floating superheavy-class' oil rig platforms

articles.summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has made a $5 million donation to online learning organization, Khan Academy, CNN reported Tuesday. Khan Academy founder Salma Khan publicly thanked Musk in a YouTube video for the donation which he had made through his Musk Foundation. For all the latest headlines follow our Google News channel online or via the app. 'This is going to allow us to accelerate all sorts of content. Our aspirations are all subjects from kids to early stages of college. This will accelerate our science content, allow us to do more early learning, allow us to make the software and the practice that much more engaging,' said Khan in the YouTube video.
articles.title: Elon Musk donates $5m to Khan Academy in bid to support free distance learning

articles.summary: A tweet from Elon Musk sent Etsy shares surging on Tuesday. (Reuters Image)The stock of e-commerce company Etsy soared in pre-market trade on Tuesday - all thanks to a tweet from the world's richest person. Tesla CEO Elon Musk wrote "I kinda love Etsy" on the microblogging platform, explaining that he had bought "a hand knit wool Marvin the Martian helm" for his dog.The tweet sent Etsy shares surging. According to a Bloomberg report, shares gained as much as 8.6% and hit an intraday record.On popular request, Mr Musk, 49, also shared adorable photos of his pet dog in the Looney Tunes-inspired hat.
articles.title: World's Richest Man Bought A Gift For His Dog. Then This Happened

articles.summary: Canadian tennis player Felix Auger-Aliassime can hit volleys not only on the tennis court but also on social media, as he proved by giving a tongue-in-cheek response to Elon Musk on Twitter earlier this week.Elon Musk is the man behind SpaceX, Tesla Inc. and other ground-breaking companies, who recently became the world's richest person. On Tuesday, Musk responded to a post on Twitter that the Starship SN9 had passed the initial pressure test but that SpaceX was awaiting approval from the FAA - short for the Federal Aviation Administration.
articles.author: Haresh Ramchandani
articles.title: Felix Auger-Aliassime hilariously gives Elon Musk 'FAA approval' for Starship SN9 flight test

articles.summary: © BRITTA PEDERSEN/POOL/EPA-EFE/Shutterstock / BRITTA PEDERSEN/POOL/EPA-EFE/Shutterstock Mandatory Credit: Photo by BRITTA PEDERSEN/POOL/EPA-EFE/Shutterstock (11088639f)SpaceX owner and Tesla CEO Elon Musk poses after arriving on the red carpet for the Axel Springer award, in Berlin, Germany, 01 December 2020. The stock market, while generally bullish all year, is nothing if not volatile. Billionaire Elon Musk, whose fortune is mostly tied up in Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA) stock, dropped from richest person in the world since early January to the second richest, behind Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos.
articles.title: Tesla CEO Elon Musk Loses Billions, Touts Etsy and GameStop, Lands Rockets

articles.title: AOC & Elon Musk Come To An Agreement On Robinhood Insanity

articles.summary: Britta Pedersen-Pool/Getty Images Tesla boss Elon Musk gave Etsy a boost on Tuesday by tweeting his affection for the e-commerce site after buying a Looney Tunes-inspired hat for his dog. The company's stock then rose 9% in premarket trading, as previously reported by CNBC."I kinda love Etsy," he wrote. "Bought a hand knit wool Marvin the Martian helm for my dog." pic.twitter.com/v7cffwac0A— Elon Musk (@elonmusk) January 26, 2021 Etsy seemed grateful for the boost, replying with a link to some retro-style Mars posters -- a nod to Musk's efforts to reach the red planet.
articles.author: Sean Keane
articles.title: Elon Musk tweets that he "kinda loves" Etsy, share price jumps

articles.summary: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) Elon Musk has tweeted a digital magazine cover featuring a dog in apparent support of a digital currency Dogecoin. What Happened: Dogecoin, a digital currency that was launched as a joke, has surpassed all-time high today, growing by 420.29% in a matter of one day, according to a data analytics platform CoinMarketCap. The cryptocurrency is currently traded at $0.03831 at the time of publishing. pic.twitter.com/a6kmk0PEgM — Elon Musk (@elonmusk) January 28, 2021 Musk's followers recognized the tweet as an endorsement to the current Dogecoin rally, expressing overwhelming support in the Dogecoin future.
articles.author: Catherine Ross
articles.title: Elon Musk Tweets In Support Of Dogecoin After Price Grows 420% In A Day

articles.summary: To finish off what has been a wild week for markets in comes Elon Musk sending the price of bitcoin up more than 15 per cent.  The Tesla founder added #bitcoin to his Twitter bio in the early hours of Friday before cryptically tweeting: 'In retrospect, it was inevitable.'  Read more: Elon Musk brands shorting stock a ‘scam' following GameStop trading restrictions Prices in the cryptocurrency leapt from just over $32,000 to $38,000 in under an hour after Musk's tweet before falling back to $36,497 by 10.
articles.author: Angharad Carrick
articles.title: Bitcoin skyrockets as Elon Musk expresses support

articles.summary: By Helen CosterFILE PHOTO: SpaceX owner and Tesla CEO Elon Musk poses after arriving on the red carpet for the Axel Springer award, in Berlin, Germany, December 1, 2020. REUTERS/Hannibal Hanschke/Pool(Reuters) - A veteran rocket from billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk's SpaceX aerospace company launched 143 spacecraft into space on Sunday, a new record for the most spaceships deployed on a single mission, according to the company.The Falcon 9 rocket lifted off at 10 a.m. EST from the Space Launch Complex 40 at Cape Canaveral Space Force Station in Florida.
articles.title: Need a lift? SpaceX launches record spacecraft in cosmic rideshare program

articles.summary: In an already turbulent and volatile week for the financial markets, with the shorted stock prices of companies like GameStop surging, eyes returned to the world of Bitcoin after Elon Musk added '#bitcoin' to his Twitter bio.After the CEO of SpaceX and Tesla, Inc., added the hashtag early on Friday morning, Bitcoin prices skyrocketed by as much as 20%, climbing suddenly in the early hours of the morning. According to cryptocurrency site CoinDesk, Bitcoin prices rose $5,000 in an hour to $37,299, increasing further to $37,653 by 8.
articles.author: Ian Haworth
articles.title: Elon Musk Adds ‘#bitcoin' To His Twitter Bio, Bitcoin Surges By 20%

articles.summary: In an already turbulent and volatile week for the financial markets, with the shorted stock prices of companies like GameStop surging, eyes returned to the world of Bitcoin after Elon Musk added '#bitcoin' to his Twitter bio. After the CEO of SpaceX and Tesla, Inc., added the hashtag early on Friday morning, Bitcoin prices skyrocketed by as much as 20%, climbing suddenly in the early hours of the morning. According to cryptocurrency site CoinDesk, Bitcoin prices rose $5,000 in an hour to $37,299, increasing further to $37,653 by 8.
articles.title: Elon Musk Adds '#bitcoin' To His Twitter Bio, Bitcoin Surges By 20%

articles.summary: FILE PHOTO: SpaceX owner and Tesla CEO Elon Musk gestures after arriving on the red carpet for the Axel Springer award, in Berlin, Germany, December 1, 2020. REUTERS/Hannibal Hanschke (Reuters) - A veteran rocket from billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk's SpaceX aerospace company launched 143 spacecraft into space on Sunday, a new record for the most spaceships deployed on a single mission, according to the company. The Falcon 9 rocket lifted off at 10 a.m. EST from the Space Launch Complex 40 at Cape Canaveral Space Force Station in Florida.
articles.title: Need a lift? SpaceX launches record spacecraft in cosmic rideshare program

articles.summary: Mr Musk and his SpaceX have been attempting to launch a prototype of the Starship rocket, called SN9, for several weeks. However, the company has delayed the event on numerous occasions due to bad weather, repair work, and because of a hold up in regulatory approval from the FAA. The most recent cancellation, which was scheduled for January 28, was scrapped due to a hold up in the FAA's side. While the governmental body, which permits air travel, did not give a reason for the delay, its website said it had been given approval for a January 29 launch.
articles.author: Sean Martin
articles.title: SpaceX: Elon Musk slams FAA over Starship cancellation 'Humanity will never get to Mars'

articles.summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk changed his Twitter bio to “#bitcoin.” This alone perhaps wouldn’t be that interesting — after all, Musk expressed his interest in Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies before — but Musk … Read Full Story The post Elon Musk changes Twitter bio to #bitcoin, chaos ensues appeared first on ForexTV.
articles.author: Bitcoin News Editor
articles.title: Elon Musk changes Twitter bio to #bitcoin, chaos ensues

articles.summary: SpaceX fans are hoping to see the Starship Serial Number 9 (SN9) take to the skies this week after three weeks of delays and dashed hopes. The present iteration of the spacecraft prototype is due to launch and land at Boca Chica, South Texas, during its first suborbital test flight. SpaceX's last attempt to land a Starship prototype did not end well for the 160ft (50m) rocket, which blew up on the launchpad . But news of a launch date has been scant and a combination of poor weather and hardware problems have scuppered SpaceX's plans so far.
articles.title: SpaceX Starship launch delay: Elon Musk says SN9 is 'waiting for FAA review' as fans rally

articles.summary: Tesla founder and CEO Elon Musk took to Twitter to troll CD Projekt Red over Cyberpunk 2077's continued technical issues, even after a recent bugfix. The issues surrounding Cyberpunk 2077's launch and most recent hotfix have certainly caused issues for many fans, including Elon Musk. Musk, who is no stranger to controversy, had previously trolled CD Projekt Red when they Tweeted regarding the issues with Cyberpunk 2077 on PS4 and Xbox One. At the time, Musk replied with a screenshot of a Reddit post, expressing some of the fanbase's frustrations following the launch of the game.
articles.author: Joshua Tyler
articles.title: Elon Musk Takes Another Shot At Cyberpunk 2077 On Twitter

articles.summary: Guest essay by Eric Worrall Remember all those assurances we've heard over the years, that carbon capture technology is ready for mainstream deployment? Turns out the technology is a little less ready to deploy than some people would like you to believe. From Elon Musk; Am donating $100M towards a prize for best carbon capture technology— Elon Musk (@elonmusk) January 21, 2021 So what are the chances of someone collecting the prize? Bloomberg thinks this moonshot can't miss; Elon Musk's Moonshot Prize Can't MissBy Kyle StockJanuary 24, 2021, 7:00 AM ESTMr.
articles.author: Eric Worrall
articles.title: Elon Musk Offers $100 Million for the Best Carbon Capture Technology

articles.summary: Fans of meme cryptocurrency D ogecoin rejoiced on Thursday after it was referenced by Elon Musk, but the billionaire CEO caused markets to trend in a different direction on Friday by changing his Twitter bio to promote bitcoin. The change by Musk was enough to cause bitcoin 's price to surge by up to 20 percent, CNBC reported as real-time price tracking data from CoinMarketCap showed the value spiked from around $32,000 to more than $37,000 in a matter of hours. At the time of writing, Musk's latest tweet reads: "In retrospect, it was inevitable.
articles.author: Jason Murdock
articles.title: Elon Musk changes Twitter bio to "#bitcoin" after apparent nod to Dogecoin with meme
